## Bio

I'am a MSc. student at the National Institute of Genomic Medicine in Mexico City. My research focuses on circulating tumor cells and pancreatic cancer transcriptomes.\
Bioinformatics enthusiast who loves hiking, swimming and playing guitar.\ 
Sometimes I do livestreaming on Twitch.\
